website_summaries.verdict: A deburring tool that’s great for simple needs and will last a long time.
pros: Aluminum handle is light but durable and conveniently stores the blades
3 blades allow for work with plastic and various metals
Rotating head can adjust to rounded shapes
cons: Can rust in humid or wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: Sliding collar doesn't work. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to replacing my plastic deburring tool because it is worn out and will not hold the tip any longer. When I unboxed this tool all the items were in the box. This tool has a sliding collar that engages and release a ball that hold the tip in place. I returned the tool because the collar would not slide over the ball, therfore the tip does not lock in. I returned this item and received the full price without problems from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: daly_beach

customer_reviews.title: Fast deburring on aluminum tubing
customer_reviews.text: This works really good on deburring the inner diameter on aluminum tubing - even holes as small as 5/16's can be deburred, maybe smaller- and it does it rather quickly- The blades must be made from a hardened tool steel because they're still deburring after hours of use. I like the fact that I will only have to purchase the blades in the future and not a whole new tool. I find that it's only practical for deburring inside of a drilled hole or at the tube ends- for outer diameter deburring i use a different tool that fits over the end of the tube- either tool or tube can spin to deburr and create a finished look.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is somewhat new to machining (about 3 years now) I looked and looked for what would be the best deburring tool as I don't want to cut my hands using something cheap. Shaviv seems to be the 'standard' from what I could find. Really like this tool especially with TiN inserts (I work with a lot of CRES and other exotic metals which are very hard).
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deburring tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this deburring tool however it tends to rust very easily even from just light humidity in the air during summer so oil it up frequently. Mine literally rusted up over night and I was shocked BUT works excellent and I do on the flip side love how well it works in deburring not to mention the quick release swap out cutting blades. They swivel easily on curves as well and despite the rust issue above, I would recommend this to hobbyists needing a deburring tool. For what it's worth, I use mine in coin ring making.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Spagnolo

customer_reviews.title: Vibroscribe your name on it quick
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy aluminum handle for a good grip at a reasonable price. I don't like the plastic threaded storage cap because it falls off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: bobj401

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I am an industrial electrician and I've owned this tool for about 8 months. I used it maybe four times a week. When not in use it was safely in my pouch, never dropped or damaged. Yesterday when I pulled it out thr sliding collar that locks the bit in no longer moved so the bit just fell out, meaning it was useless. I attempted to repair it but the spring refused to go back into place. It was promptly thrown in the can with the rest of the garbage. I recommend looking for other more durable tools than this one that breaks while in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Moffat

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This deburring tool works like a charm and is well built. Bits are easy to change and stay sharp for a long time. Great for taking off the sharp burrs when you cut pipe or tubing with and abrasive wheel or cutting/drilling holes in sheet metal.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 of these and one was defective
customer_reviews.text: The overall condition of the deburring tool was very good. One of the bearings that held the blade in the tool was missing and return to amazon was frustrating due to both pcs had to be returned, would have been nice to be able to return only one unit but didn't have choice. Other co-workers have this unit and are satisfied with performance on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Dr. ordered.
customer_reviews.text: this is the greatest tool for removing burs on newly cut holes and inside pipes. You even get 2 knives.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: best deburring tools from a great company
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat the shaviv quality. No frills it gets the job done 100% of the time. Even comes with spare blades
customer_reviews.author: Parth Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp works well
customer_reviews.text: I have had good experiences with Shaviv deburring tools. This one works well
customer_reviews.author: FF Racer 12

customer_reviews.title: Good strong heavy handle
customer_reviews.text: The handle is nice so usta using plastic ones, this is made well and I do alota heavy deburring at work
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and he loves it. He had the same brand years ago and ws really excited when I found him one.
customer_reviews.author: Foof

customer_reviews.title: ball fell out
customer_reviews.text: Retaing ball fell out first time using it on metal.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Precision heavy duty construction that will last a lifetime. ...
customer_reviews.text: Precision heavy duty construction that will last a lifetime. I fully expect the handle will outlast me. Not a single complaint with Shaviv's deburring tool.
customer_reviews.author: slowhand8575

customer_reviews.title: Best deburing tool I've used
customer_reviews.text: Best deburing tool I've used. Surprised that you have to be careful to not pull the blade changing sleeve too far back otherwise the ball bearing will fall out. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: HandyMan

customer_reviews.title: Deburring tool very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my work as I work in the metal industry for deburring parts. Works very good for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Initially had cross threaded base from assembly, wasn't damaged though and threaded back in correctly. This is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent deburring tool. High quality materials. the blades it comes with last a long time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Cifelli

customer_reviews.title: I recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Good design... For price I suggest to add few more deburring blades.
customer_reviews.author: HA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool to Deburr
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this tool. I have used it on various metals and projects and it works well. I see it as very good quality tool also. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicer to use than the plastic version made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harris

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product is defective. Retainer sleeve does not into locking position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone's tool box!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for it's intended purpose!! A "well" used tool in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. Very sturdy with sharp bits. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Polymath's Practical Profundities

customer_reviews.title: Ehh good tool bad seller
customer_reviews.text: Missing every blade except one. Package was open and cap off the tool.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStar Malinois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it dose what i need it to do and has storage for more blades
customer_reviews.author: colt johnson the plumber

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tool, worth the spending the couple of extra dollars on. Feels like you got what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool! Wish I would have known about these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: this is a great tool. From deburring plastics to metal
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great tool. From deburring plastics to metal, I use this tool all the time. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Trolleyking

customer_reviews.title: Bait n switch
customer_reviews.text: I looked at every Shaviv deburring tool on Amazon and decided on the one I liked. When it arrived I notice that it isn't the item I saw in the picture. It does the job but if a picture is posted it should be of the item that arrives to the customer not whatever you feel like sending that day. My next tool purchase will be at a local store for this very reason.
customer_reviews.author: SFL

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple tool with storage for extra tips. Very well designed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice and sturdy aluminum handle. Easy to grip and keep ahold of. Only bad I have to say is the color is ugly....make it blue
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it was missing the extra pieces and appeared to have been opened before
customer_reviews.author: Tara and joe

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I receive it. Too much crap to go through returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Payne

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Used one when I worked at a research laboratory. Now I own one. Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.author: Willco

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on a 30lb 134a tank 3/4 full allowed blanket ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a 30lb 134a tank 3/4 full allowed blanket to cool on tank did this 5 times on jobs on different days. The 6th day I attached blanket to preheat, after the attempted charge it failed requiring me to spend the extra hour to start over again to vacuum and using the customer sink to heat the tank ( very unprofessional )
customer_reviews.author: DavoBravo

product_meta.title: SHAVIV 90087 Classic Heavy Deburring Tool Kit E with Aluminum Handle A (4 Pieces)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1

The SHAVIV 151-90087 Classic Heavy Deburring Kit E includes one aluminum A handle, one E blade holder, and three E-series blades for heavy duty long-reach deburring of straight edges and hole edges. The aluminum A handle provides strength and wear resistance for heavy duty work and accepts all SHAVIV holders for long-reach applications. The E blade holder holds SHAVIV E-series blades.

The kit contains one each of E100, E200, and E300 high-speed steel blades. The E100 blade is designed for heavy duty deburring of straight edges and hole edges on steel, aluminum, copper, and plastic. The E200 blade is designed for deburring straight edges and hole edges on brass, cast iron, and plastic. It rotates clockwise as well as counterclockwise. The E300 blade is designed for simultaneously deburring the inside and outside of holes up to 0.24" thick on steel, aluminum, and copper.

Deburring cutters are hand tools used to remove sharp edges and small unwanted bumps, also known as burrs, from material. The cutter typically consists of two pieces: a handle and a blade. The handle holds a blade that is typically made from high-speed steel, carbide, or ceramic, and may have a coating to extend its life or for work on tougher materials. The blades have different designs for deburring in a range of applications, such as straight edges, hole edges, through-holes, slots, and corners. A blade holder can be connected to a handle to hold the blade for long-reach work.

Vargus manufactures cutting, grooving and deburring tools under the Vardex, Groovex, and SHAVIV brand names. The company, founded in 1960 and headquartered in Nahariya, Israel, meets International Organization for Standardization (ISO) standard 9001:2000.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * (1) Aluminum A handle
 * (1) E blade holder
 * (1) E100 blade
 * (1) E200 blade
 * (1) E300 blade
feature_bullets: Kit includes one aluminum A handle, one E blade holder, and three E-series blades for heavy duty long-reach deburring of straight edges and hole edges
Aluminum handle is lightweight yet strong and durable for heavy duty work
E style holder for long-reach work holds SHAVIV E-series blades
E-series blades are made of high-speed steel for a broad range of materials
